---

## Setup Instructions

1. Go to https://github.com/sponsors/jfuginay/dashboard
2. Click "Set up tiers" or "Edit tiers"
3. Create each tier with the amounts and descriptions above
4. Enable the features you want to offer
5. Publish your sponsorship program!

**Pro tips:**
- GitHub Sponsors has a 30-day trial period for new sponsors
- You can offer custom amounts too
- Consider adding milestone goals (e.g., "At $500/month, I'll create a YouTube series")
- Keep your sponsor-only updates engaging and valuable
